result.title: Methods for Complex Events Processing – Final version
result.description: The final version of the methods for complex event Processing will be provided. The focus will be on the dynamicity of the processing infrastructure that includes definition of complex event patterns and setting up the infrastructure (sources and processing elements) - This deliverable, although a demonstrator, will be accompanied be the corresponding report.

result.description: This deliverable will report on the dissemination activities of the period, including press releases and newsletters, on the collaboration activities with other ITS projects and on possible standardization activities. result.title: Project Open Days
result.description:
A series of workshops/seminars have been scheduled across all the project duration. They will consist of a public and a consortium only dedicated part. The purpose of these networking activities is multiple. The first aim is to guarantee knowledge transfer by presenting the state of art and advancement of the tasks already developed and to receive feedback from scientific users and stakeholders. The tentative date and place for the 3 POD is:
POD1 Aigües Segarra-Garrigues/Demonstrative farms M13 POD2 Cadi Ayyad University- Marrakech M19 POD3 Ecole Nationale Supérieure Agronomique of Toulouse M37
